minidraw.framework
Interface Figure

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractFigure, CompositeFigure, GroupFigure, ImageFigure, StandardDrawing
public interface Figure

This interface defines the role of a figure in a MiniDraw drawing. Responsibilities: Represent a Figure in the model Draw itself in a Graphics context Subject role in the observer pattern. This code is highly inspired by JHotDraw 5.1 Author Henrik Bærbak Christensen 2006

Method Summary

          Adds a listener for this figure.

          Informes that a figure has changed its display box.

Method Detail

draw

void draw(java.awt.Graphics g)
Draws the figure.

Parameters:
g - the Graphics to draw into

displayBox

java.awt.Rectangle displayBox()
Return the display box of this figure. The display box is the smallest rectangle that completely contains the figure.

Returns:
the display box.

moveBy

void moveBy(int dx,
            int dy)
Move the figure by a delta (dx, dy).

Parameters:
dx - amount to move in x
dy - amount to move in y

invalidate

void invalidate()
Invalidates the figure. This method informs the listeners that the figure's current display box is invalid and should be refreshed.

changed

void changed()
Informes that a figure has changed its display box. This method also triggers an update call for its registered observers.

addFigureChangeListener

void addFigureChangeListener(FigureChangeListener l)
Adds a listener for this figure.

removeFigureChangeListener

void removeFigureChangeListener(FigureChangeListener l)
Removes a listener for this figure.
